train module¶

train.fit(df, features, target, task='classificaiton', explainmodel=False)¶

1 - Preprocess the data: impute missing value, normalize if necessary, one-hot encode 2 - Instanciate and run a training pipeline performing a grid search along with cross-validation

Parameters

  • df (DataFrame) –

  • features (list(str)) – Fea tures to train the model on

  • target (str) – Target va variable

  • task (str, optional) – Defaults to ‘classificaiton’.

  • explainmodel (bool, optional) – Whether to explain model

Returns:

train.predict(model, preprocessing, x)¶
Parameters

  • model ([type]) – Trained model

  • preprocessing ([type]) – Fiited preprocessing pipeline

  • x (DataFrame) – Input data

Returns

[description]

Return type

[list]
